title: Is Ohtani Out?
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon discuss if the Angels should consider trading Ohtani after a report that the Mets have inquired, how Kirk Cousins should feel about his GM’s comments and if college football needs an intervention.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Tony Kornheiser, Michael Wilbon
itunes:subtitle: PTI: The Mets have inquired about trading for Ohtani and does college football need an intervention?
